thread.title: Ground News - Travel disruption latest for motorists and rail passengers after Storm Gerrit
thread.title_full: Ground News - Travel disruption latest for motorists and rail passengers after Storm Gerrit

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Travel disruption latest for motorists and rail passengers after Storm Gerrit
text:
Summary by Ground News Around 2900 homes remain without power as of 5pm on Thursday. Scottish and Southern Electricity warned some could be without supply into Friday. The weather conditions also disrupted travel , with some drivers trapped for hours on the A9 which was closed at Drumotcher in the Highlands due to snow. Share menu More
